validation.domainExists: A Blockchain Domain with the same [FIELD_NAME] already exists!
validation.mainDomainValidation: Maximum of 63 lowercase alphanumeric characters, dashes included. Must start and end with an alphanumeric character.
validation.subdomainValidation: Maximum of 63 lowercase alphanumeric characters, dashes and dots included. Must start and end with an alphanumeric character.
validation.vaultDomainValidation: Maximum of 30 alphanumeric characters, dashes, underscores and dots included.
validation.jenkinsValidation: Jenkins URL does not have a valid format!
validation.githubUsecaseRepositoryValidation: Github repository URL does not have a valid format!

mainDomain.label: Main domain
mainDomain.description: Maximum of 63 lowercase alphanumeric characters, dashes included. Must start and end with an alphanumeric character.

subdomain.label: Subdomain
subdomain.description: Maximum of 63 lowercase alphanumeric characters, dashes and dots included. Must start and end with an alphanumeric character.

vaultDomain.label: Vault domain
vaultDomain.description: Maximum of 30 alphanumeric characters, dashes, underscores and dots included.

jenkinsToken.label: Jenkins Token
jenkinsToken.description: Jenkins Authorization Token associated to you Jenkins user name
